# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the action is currently enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. Changing the value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] causes the action to appear dimmed in the resulting alert. When an action is disabled, taps on the corresponding button have no effect.

## Getting the action’s attributes

- **title**: The title of the action’s button.
- **style**: The style that applies to the action’s button.
